data.quote: Pride is not the opposite of shame, but its source. True humility is the only antidote to shame.
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: It is usually best to admit mistakes when they occur, and to seek to restore honor.
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: It is important to draw wisdom from many different places. If you take it from only one place it becomes rigid and stale.
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: It's time for you to look inward and start asking yourself the big question: who are you and what do you want?
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: Sharing tea with a fascinating stranger is one of lifeâ€™s true delights.
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: Hope is something you give yourself. That is the meaning of inner strength.
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: Destiny is a funny thing. You never know how things are going to work out.
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: While it is always best to believe in oneself, a little help from others can be a great blessing.
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not.
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: Sometimes life is like this dark tunnel. You can't always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you just keep moving, you will come to a better place.
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: There are reasons each of us are born. We have to find those reasons.
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: Failure is only the opportunity to begin again, only this time more wisely.
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: If you look for the light, you can often find it. But if you look for the dark that is all you will ever see.
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: Sick of tea? That's like being sick of breathing!
data.author: Uncle Iroh

data.quote: Perfect and power are overrated. I think you were very wise to choose happiness and love.
data.author: Uncle Iroh
